text: Az in ki islom ovardaand, (inho a'roʙiho) ʙar tu ej Rasul minnat mekunand. Bigū ʙarojaşon: «Ba xotiri islomaton ʙar man minnat maguzored, caro ki naf'i imon ʙa xudi on inson ʙarmegardad, ʙalki Alloh ʙa on saʙaʙ, ki şumoro ʙa imon roh namudaast, ʙar şumo minnat menihad, agar dar iddi'oi imonaton rost va durust hasted!»
